description.p: The perspecitve transformation changes projection (angle and position) of flat image in space. For details see wikipedia.

usage.p: Method is useful for registration of two (originaly flat) images which was captured (i.e. by camera) from different angles and position.

By setting of four point into each of input images transformation params are computed and first (top/left) image is perspectively transformed that four control points are matched one to correspondig one in other image.
Selection of four reffering points is possible to made by tool "set point"
